name: city park game
description:
an ode to the little worlds of city parks

WASD + mouse to move

press 1/2/3/4 to change visuals

i don't know if the mac build works...hopefully it does! (i am told it works, but you have to do "the usual thing in the command line." whatever that means...)

inspired by the lovely camera games of GURN GROUP

one of the background wind files is "Wind, Realistic, A" by the ever-reliable Inspector J (thanks Inspector J :))

i lost track of what models are what....but they are all from https://www.models-resource.com/
